short_summary: The contractor must supply, deliver and install a new blast cabinet and media recovery system to replace the current outdated and damaged blast cabinet.

full_summary:
### Solicitation for Sandblaster Services and Materials
#### Solicitation Number
WS4122968708

#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply, delivery, and installation of a blast cabinet and media recovery system.

#### Objective
The goal is to replace the outdated and damaged blast cabinet currently installed on the shop floor of CESF / 86 Airfield Systems & Utilities (ASU), 8 Wing Trenton.

#### Delivery Location
8 St Jean Ave, Bldg 291, Astra, ON K0K 3W0

#### Sources of Supply
All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

#### Trade Agreements
Supply deliveries must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For inquiries related to technical requirements or contractual aspects, please contact Judy Holt at [judy.holt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:judy.holt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada.

#### Additional Information
Pursuant to amendment to the closing time, all required supporting documents and bid submissions are due by 14:00 EDT on August 21, 2023. Any bid submissions received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Technical Requirements
 Please refer to the document link below for more information regarding this solicitation: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17051299?extsite=MTcwNTEyOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
